verses.arabic_text: وَٱلذَّٰرِيَٰتِ ذَرۡوٗا
verses.translation: By the winds that scatter [dust],

verses.arabic_text: فَٱلۡحَٰمِلَٰتِ وِقۡرٗا
verses.translation: and by the clouds carrying loads of water,

verses.arabic_text: فَٱلۡجَٰرِيَٰتِ يُسۡرٗا
verses.translation: and by the ships that sail with ease,

verses.arabic_text: فَٱلۡمُقَسِّمَٰتِ أَمۡرًا
verses.translation: and by the angels who distribute [blessings] by His command.

verses.arabic_text: إِنَّمَا تُوعَدُونَ لَصَادِقٞ
verses.translation: Indeed, what you are promised is true,

verses.arabic_text: وَإِنَّ ٱلدِّينَ لَوَٰقِعٞ
verses.translation: and the Judgment will surely come to pass.

verses.arabic_text: وَٱلسَّمَآءِ ذَاتِ ٱلۡحُبُكِ
verses.translation: By the heaven with its pathways[1],

verses.arabic_text: إِنَّكُمۡ لَفِي قَوۡلٖ مُّخۡتَلِفٖ
verses.translation: Indeed, you [Makkans] have conflicting views[2].

verses.arabic_text: يُؤۡفَكُ عَنۡهُ مَنۡ أُفِكَ
verses.translation: He who is diverted from it is destined to be diverted.

verses.arabic_text: قُتِلَ ٱلۡخَرَّٰصُونَ
verses.translation: Doomed[3] are those who base their beliefs on conjecture.

verses.arabic_text: ٱلَّذِينَ هُمۡ فِي غَمۡرَةٖ سَاهُونَ
verses.translation: those who are steeped in ignorance heedlessly.

verses.arabic_text: يَسۡـَٔلُونَ أَيَّانَ يَوۡمُ ٱلدِّينِ
verses.translation: They ask [mockingly], “When is the Day of Judgment?”

verses.arabic_text: يَوۡمَ هُمۡ عَلَى ٱلنَّارِ يُفۡتَنُونَ
verses.translation: It is the Day when they will be punished by the Fire.

verses.arabic_text: ذُوقُواْ فِتۡنَتَكُمۡ هَٰذَا ٱلَّذِي كُنتُم بِهِۦ تَسۡتَعۡجِلُونَ
verses.translation: [It will be said], “Taste your punishment! This is what you were seeking to hasten.”

verses.arabic_text: إِنَّ ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ فِي جَنَّٰتٖ وَعُيُونٍ
verses.translation: Indeed, the righteous will be in gardens and springs,

verses.arabic_text: ءَاخِذِينَ مَآ ءَاتَىٰهُمۡ رَبُّهُمۡۚ إِنَّهُمۡ كَانُواْ قَبۡلَ ذَٰلِكَ مُحۡسِنِينَ
verses.translation: receiving what their Lord will give them, for they were indeed doers of good beforehand.

verses.arabic_text: كَانُواْ قَلِيلٗا مِّنَ ٱلَّيۡلِ مَا يَهۡجَعُونَ
verses.translation: They used to sleep only a little at night[4],

verses.arabic_text: وَبِٱلۡأَسۡحَارِ هُمۡ يَسۡتَغۡفِرُونَ
verses.translation: and before dawn they would seek forgiveness[5],

verses.arabic_text: وَفِيٓ أَمۡوَٰلِهِمۡ حَقّٞ لِّلسَّآئِلِ وَٱلۡمَحۡرُومِ
verses.translation: and in their wealth, there was a share for the beggar and the destitute.

verses.arabic_text: وَفِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ ءَايَٰتٞ لِّلۡمُوقِنِينَ
verses.translation: On earth there are signs for those who are certain in faith,

verses.arabic_text: وَفِيٓ أَنفُسِكُمۡۚ أَفَلَا تُبۡصِرُونَ
verses.translation: and also within yourselves. Do you not see?

verses.arabic_text: وَفِي ٱلسَّمَآءِ رِزۡقُكُمۡ وَمَا تُوعَدُونَ
verses.translation: And in the heaven is your provision and all that you are promised.

verses.arabic_text: فَوَرَبِّ ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ إِنَّهُۥ لَحَقّٞ مِّثۡلَ مَآ أَنَّكُمۡ تَنطِقُونَ
verses.translation: By the Lord of the heaven and earth, this [resurrection] is certainly as true as the fact that you can speak.

verses.arabic_text: هَلۡ أَتَىٰكَ حَدِيثُ ضَيۡفِ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ ٱلۡمُكۡرَمِينَ
verses.translation: Has there come to you the story of Abraham’s honored guests[6]?

verses.arabic_text: إِذۡ دَخَلُواْ عَلَيۡهِ فَقَالُواْ سَلَٰمٗاۖ قَالَ سَلَٰمٞ قَوۡمٞ مُّنكَرُونَ
verses.translation: When they came to him and said, “Peace.” He said, “Upon you be peace.” [saying to himself] “Unknown people!”

verses.arabic_text: فَرَاغَ إِلَىٰٓ أَهۡلِهِۦ فَجَآءَ بِعِجۡلٖ سَمِينٖ
verses.translation: Then he went quickly to his household, and came with a fat [roasted] calf,

verses.arabic_text: فَقَرَّبَهُۥٓ إِلَيۡهِمۡ قَالَ أَلَا تَأۡكُلُونَ
verses.translation: and placed it before them and said, “Will you not eat?”

verses.arabic_text: فَأَوۡجَسَ مِنۡهُمۡ خِيفَةٗۖ قَالُواْ لَا تَخَفۡۖ وَبَشَّرُوهُ بِغُلَٰمٍ عَلِيمٖ
verses.translation: He felt apprehensive about them[7]. They said, “Do not be afraid,” and gave him glad tidings of a knowledgeable son.

verses.arabic_text: فَأَقۡبَلَتِ ٱمۡرَأَتُهُۥ فِي صَرَّةٖ فَصَكَّتۡ وَجۡهَهَا وَقَالَتۡ عَجُوزٌ عَقِيمٞ
verses.translation: His wife cried out loud, and struck her face [in astonishment] and said, “[I am] a barren old woman!”

verses.arabic_text: قَالُواْ كَذَٰلِكِ قَالَ رَبُّكِۖ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ
verses.translation: They said, “This is what your Lord said. Indeed, He is the All-Wise, the All-Knowing.”

verses.arabic_text: ۞ قَالَ فَمَا خَطۡبُكُمۡ أَيُّهَا ٱلۡمُرۡسَلُونَ
verses.translation: Abraham said, “Then what is your mission, O messengers?”

verses.arabic_text: قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّآ أُرۡسِلۡنَآ إِلَىٰ قَوۡمٖ مُّجۡرِمِينَ
verses.translation: They said, “We have been sent to a wicked people,

verses.arabic_text: لِنُرۡسِلَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ حِجَارَةٗ مِّن طِينٖ
verses.translation: to send down upon them stones of clay,

verses.arabic_text: مُّسَوَّمَةً عِندَ رَبِّكَ لِلۡمُسۡرِفِينَ
verses.translation: marked by your Lord for the transgressors.”

verses.arabic_text: فَأَخۡرَجۡنَا مَن كَانَ فِيهَا مِنَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ
verses.translation: We brought out those believers who were there,

verses.arabic_text: فَمَا وَجَدۡنَا فِيهَا غَيۡرَ بَيۡتٖ مِّنَ ٱلۡمُسۡلِمِينَ
verses.translation: but We only found in it one Muslim household[8].

verses.arabic_text: وَتَرَكۡنَا فِيهَآ ءَايَةٗ لِّلَّذِينَ يَخَافُونَ ٱلۡعَذَابَ ٱلۡأَلِيمَ
verses.translation: And We left there a sign[9] for those who fear the painful punishment.

verses.arabic_text: وَفِي مُوسَىٰٓ إِذۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَٰهُ إِلَىٰ فِرۡعَوۡنَ بِسُلۡطَٰنٖ مُّبِينٖ
verses.translation: And [there is a sign in the story of] Moses when We sent him to Pharaoh with compelling proofs,

verses.arabic_text: فَتَوَلَّىٰ بِرُكۡنِهِۦ وَقَالَ سَٰحِرٌ أَوۡ مَجۡنُونٞ
verses.translation: But he and his supporters turned away, and he said about [Moses], “A magician or a madman!”

verses.arabic_text: فَأَخَذۡنَٰهُ وَجُنُودَهُۥ فَنَبَذۡنَٰهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡيَمِّ وَهُوَ مُلِيمٞ
verses.translation: So We seized him and his soldiers and cast them into the sea while he was blameworthy[10].

verses.arabic_text: وَفِي عَادٍ إِذۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَا عَلَيۡهِمُ ٱلرِّيحَ ٱلۡعَقِيمَ
verses.translation: And [there is a sign in the story of] ‘Ād, when We sent against them the devastating barren wind[11].

verses.arabic_text: مَا تَذَرُ مِن شَيۡءٍ أَتَتۡ عَلَيۡهِ إِلَّا جَعَلَتۡهُ كَٱلرَّمِيمِ
verses.translation: It spared nothing it came upon except that it reduced it to ruin and decay.

verses.arabic_text: وَفِي ثَمُودَ إِذۡ قِيلَ لَهُمۡ تَمَتَّعُواْ حَتَّىٰ حِينٖ
verses.translation: And [there is a sign in the story of] Thamūd, when they were told, “Enjoy yourselves for a while[12].”

verses.arabic_text: فَعَتَوۡاْ عَنۡ أَمۡرِ رَبِّهِمۡ فَأَخَذَتۡهُمُ ٱلصَّٰعِقَةُ وَهُمۡ يَنظُرُونَ
verses.translation: But they rebelled against the command of their Lord, so the thunderbolt seized them, while they were looking on.

verses.arabic_text: فَمَا ٱسۡتَطَٰعُواْ مِن قِيَامٖ وَمَا كَانُواْ مُنتَصِرِينَ
verses.translation: They could not withstand it, nor could they ward it off.

verses.arabic_text: وَقَوۡمَ نُوحٖ مِّن قَبۡلُۖ إِنَّهُمۡ كَانُواْ قَوۡمٗا فَٰسِقِينَ
verses.translation: And the people of Noah [were also destroyed] before them. They were indeed a rebellious people.

verses.arabic_text: وَٱلسَّمَآءَ بَنَيۡنَٰهَا بِأَيۡيْدٖ وَإِنَّا لَمُوسِعُونَ
verses.translation: We built the heaven with might[13], and We are indeed expanding it.

verses.arabic_text: وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ فَرَشۡنَٰهَا فَنِعۡمَ ٱلۡمَٰهِدُونَ
verses.translation: And We spread out the earth. How well did We smooth it out[14]!

verses.arabic_text: وَمِن كُلِّ شَيۡءٍ خَلَقۡنَا زَوۡجَيۡنِ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَذَكَّرُونَ
verses.translation: And We have created everything in pairs[15], so that you may take heed.

verses.arabic_text: فَفِرُّوٓاْ إِلَى ٱللَّهِۖ إِنِّي لَكُم مِّنۡهُ نَذِيرٞ مُّبِينٞ
verses.translation: So flee to Allah[16]. Indeed, I am a clear warner to you from Him.

verses.arabic_text: وَلَا تَجۡعَلُواْ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَٰهًا ءَاخَرَۖ إِنِّي لَكُم مِّنۡهُ نَذِيرٞ مُّبِينٞ
verses.translation: And do not set up another god with Allah. Indeed, I am a clear warner to you from Him.”

verses.arabic_text: كَذَٰلِكَ مَآ أَتَى ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِهِم مِّن رَّسُولٍ إِلَّا قَالُواْ سَاحِرٌ أَوۡ مَجۡنُونٌ
verses.translation: Likewise, no messenger came to those before them without being told: “A magician, or a madman!”

verses.arabic_text: أَتَوَاصَوۡاْ بِهِۦۚ بَلۡ هُمۡ قَوۡمٞ طَاغُونَ
verses.translation: Did they suggest this to one another[17]? Rather they are transgressing people.

verses.arabic_text: فَتَوَلَّ عَنۡهُمۡ فَمَآ أَنتَ بِمَلُومٖ
verses.translation: So turn away from them [O Prophet], for you are not to blame[18].

verses.arabic_text: وَذَكِّرۡ فَإِنَّ ٱلذِّكۡرَىٰ تَنفَعُ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ
verses.translation: But keep reminding them, for reminder benefits the believers.

verses.arabic_text: وَمَا خَلَقۡتُ ٱلۡجِنَّ وَٱلۡإِنسَ إِلَّا لِيَعۡبُدُونِ
verses.translation: I have not created the jinn and mankind except to worship Me.

verses.arabic_text: مَآ أُرِيدُ مِنۡهُم مِّن رِّزۡقٖ وَمَآ أُرِيدُ أَن يُطۡعِمُونِ
verses.translation: I seek no provision from them, nor do I want them to feed Me.

verses.arabic_text: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلرَّزَّاقُ ذُو ٱلۡقُوَّةِ ٱلۡمَتِينُ
verses.translation: Indeed, it is Allah Who is the All-Provider[19], Lord of Power, the Mighty.

verses.arabic_text: فَإِنَّ لِلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُواْ ذَنُوبٗا مِّثۡلَ ذَنُوبِ أَصۡحَٰبِهِمۡ فَلَا يَسۡتَعۡجِلُونِ
verses.translation: Indeed, those who do wrong will have a share [of punishment] like that of their predecessors, so let them not ask Me to hasten it.

verses.arabic_text: فَوَيۡلٞ لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ مِن يَوۡمِهِمُ ٱلَّذِي يُوعَدُونَ
verses.translation: So woe to those who disbelieve from [the punishment of] the Day which they are promised.
